item.title: Crear y/o borrar pod y/o service
item.description: kubectl get all 1kubectl get all kubectl get nodes 1kubectl get nodes Crear pods 1kubectl create deployment case-use-001-nginx --image=nginx 2kubectl get pod 3# show environment variable for [case-use-001-nginx] pod 4kubectl exec case-use-001-nginx-7b97d7cd8b-6kwzg -- env 5# shell access [case-use-001-nginx] pod 6kubectl exec -it case-use-001-nginx-7b97d7cd8b-6kwzg -- bash 7# show logs of [case-use-001-nginx] pod 8kubectl logs case-use-001-nginx-7b97d7cd8b-6kwzg 9# scale out pods 10kubectl scale deployment case-use-001-nginx --replicas=3 11kubectl get pod ![Kubectl create pod]:../../../images/kubernetes/kubectl-pod-create-exec_cmd-logs.png Crear y/o borrar un servicio 1kubectl get pod 2# set service 3kubectl expose deployment case-use-001-nginx --type="NodePort" --port 80 4kubectl get services case-use-001-nginx 5# verify accesses 6ssh -t k3s curl 10.
